note:
My drum corps history started with 5 years of playing Euphonium/Soprano in DCI Div III. After returning to teach for a few years, I took a short break from the activity and now play Bari/Euph with 2 DCA Alumni Corps and the current DCA Brass Ensemble champions.

I also take action photos at many marching arts events (DCI/DCA/NECGC/LMBA/etc) in the WNY/PA/OH regions. They're all available for free on Flickr, so check it out to see if I've caught any of you.

name: Flickr Photo Galleries
value: https://flickr.com/photos/pepsimanab/albums
